snippet: A group of bondholders pursuing a litigation strategy that involves seeking to lay claim to Argentine assets wherever they can be found may have a tough time making its case, DealBook's bankruptcy columnist writes.
abstract: A group of bondholders pursuing a litigation strategy that involves seeking to lay claim to Argentine assets wherever they can be found may have a tough time making its case, DealBook's bankruptcy columnist writes.

headline.main: At a House Hearing, a Focus on Argentine Bonds
